text: Aurélie Groizeleau (born 27 February 1989) is a French international rugby referee. She grew up in Marans in Charente-Maritime. She was a member of the France women's national rugby union team and France women's national rugby sevens team. She was injured in 2007. She was a referee at 2019 Women's Six Nations Championship, and 2020 Women's Six Nations Championship. == References == Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:French rugby union players Category:Rugby sevens players Category:Referees Category:Sportspeople from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:People from Charente-Maritime
title: Aurélie Groizeleau
